text: Lakeland Bus Lines, Inc is a privately chartered and apportioned bus company headquartered in Dover, New Jersey. Lakeland operates commuter routes from Morris, Sussex, Somerset and Essex Counties, NJ to New York City. ==Routes== Lakeland Bus Lines provides service along three routes, each named for the corridor on which it travels.Lakeland schedules === Commuter routes === {| class="wikitable" |- !Route !Terminal A !Via !Terminal B |- |46/80 |New York Port Authority Bus Terminal |Route 46 or 80 CR 513 Route 206 (Newton trips only) Route 15 (Sparta trips only) |Budd Lake Dover Roxbury Newton, or Sparta |- |78 (rush hours only, peak direction) |New York Port Authority Bus Terminal |I-78 CR 512 Route 202 |Bernardsville or Bedminster |- |80 (rush hours only) |Midtown Manhattan or Lower Manhattan Wall Street (service to Midtown Manhattan available only inbound in AM) |Route 80 (Midtown trips express to/from Rockaway Townsquare Mall) (Lower Manhattan Trips express to/from Parsippany and Rockaway Townsquare Mall) |Mount Arlington |} === Casino Line Service === Lakeland Bus Lines provides service along routes for day or overnight trips to Atlantic City Casinos,Lakeland schedules for Atlantic City Mount Airy Casino Resort in Mount Pocono, Pennsylvania,Mount Airy Casino Resort Schedule and Wind Creek Bethlehem in Bethlehem, Pennsylvania.Sands Casino Resort Bethlehem Schedule {| class="wikitable" |- !Line !Terminal A !Via !Terminal B |- |Atlantic City (Fridays, Saturdays, and Sundays Only)
